Name: Clientelling App
Bigger Heading: Boosting Sales and Enabling Personalized Customer Experiences
My Role: Leading Product Designer - Led the design of the Lookbook feature, including user research, ideation, prototyping, and usability testing. Worked closely with developers to address technical challenges and ensure a seamless and intuitive user experience.
Team Members:
A Scrum team of 30+ (1 Senior Designer, 1 PM, 1 Senior PM, 2 Scrum Master, 5 Testers, 8 Front-end Developers, 5 Back-End Developers, 3 Tech Leads)

‍

‍
About the Project:
In 2024 Nov, we launched the version 2.0 of our clienteling app, introducing several powerful features to elevate in-store sales and enhance customer engagement. Among these was the Lookbook feature, which I designed to help sales associates create personalized product collections for clients. The Lookbook integrates seamlessly with the inventory system and offers a visually immersive way to present tailored recommendations, redefining the in-store shopping experience.

‍
Tag: UI/UX Design, Cross-Platform, B2B SaaS, User Research

Name: Debrief AI
Bigger Heading: User-Centric Strategy Pivot for Debrief AI to Secure Investment
My Role: Product Design Lead — UI/UX Design, Branding, Design, Leadership, Design Mentorship, Generative AI
Team Members:
Meitong Li, CEO
Zhen Li, CTO
Jesse Pan, Junior Designer

‍
About the Project:
With the rapid rise of AI tools like ChatGPT, our team developed a workflow prompting app to help users generate custom workflows. Just as we prepared to launch on March 23rd, 2023, OpenAI unveiled the ChatGPT Plugin, offering similar functionality with a significant market advantage. Investors hesitated, and we faced the need to pivot.

‍
About the project #2: As the design lead, I focused on redefining the product’s value, uncovering untapped opportunities, and rebuilding investor confidence through strategic redesign, fast prototype, user research, and market alignment in a fast-changing AI landscape.
Tag: AI B2B SaaS, Website, User Research, UI/UX Design, LLM

I led the redesign and implementation of a comprehensive design system for the clienteling app, focusing on bridging the gap between Figma UI kits and the in-house development platform.
